name: DCS World
description: Open beta branch of DCS World standalone.Installation and usage  of multiple modules is possible. Tested the Persian Gulf map, A-10C, F-5E, F-86, F/A-18C, Mig-15, Mig-21 and all seem to work fine.Multiplayer works as well.
notes:
Known issues:
- Installation cannot be silent. Please keep the default installation location as it is required for the script.
- Changing screen settings will crash the game, however starting the game again will have the new settings applied.
- F10 to open the map might crash the game.
- External view mouse look is not working perfectly
content:
files:
- client: https://updates.digitalcombatsimulator.com/installers/DCS_World_OpenBeta_web.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Eagle Dynamics/DCS World OpenBeta/bin/DCS_updater.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts vcrun2013 vcrun2017 d3dcompiler_43 win10
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent
    description: Installing client
    executable: client
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
